author: edith
msg: action to test the checkOut of a document

author: egli
msg: The code that was commented out is needed when deleting a language
version when we need to redirect to another language version of the
document (we cannot blindly redirect to the default language as it
might have been deleted as well).

author: egli
msg: Make sure to check all other files in the live area for links to the
current document before deactivating. Issue a warning if any other

author: egli
msg: The DefaultDocumentIdToPathMapper now also implements the
PathToDocumentIdMapper interface, i.e. it can be used to query for a
document-id given a file, an area and a publication.
